title: One Way
lyrics:
Ilbangjeog-in neowa na
Jom itta dasi geolge wae tto jiljil kkeul-eo gwichanhge
Gidaliji mallaessjanh-a budamseuleo
Ilaeseo neon ihae mos hae joh-ahaneun mam-eun algessneunde wae
Sangdaebang saeng-gag-eun an hago ili ilbangjeog-iya



Hangsang hug chigo deul-eowa neon, kkamppag-ido an kigo

Dab-eul jeonghaenohgo jilmun peobueo magujab-ilo

Taileulsulog mwonga deo bul-anhanga bwa

Binteum-eobsneun mankeum taiteuhaeseo sum-i jal an swieojyeo



Gat-eun pyeon-eulo manna meomchuji anhneun gaeinpeullei

Gyunhyeong-i dalla biteulbiteul witaehae

What should I do?

Hyeongijeung na swiun geon eobs-eo yeogsi

Geuleom-edo bulguhago heeojigin silhdaneun geoji



Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Daehwalodo an pullineun i munjel eotteoghalkkayo

Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Ibjang bakkwo saeng-gag-eul haebondago haegyeol-i doelkkayo



Oh e oh oh e oh

Na deoneun mos chamgess-eoyo

Oh e oh oh e oh

Dabdabhae juggess-eoyo help me



Issjanh-a gat-i geol-eul ttae an but-eumyeon an dwae

Deobjanh-a salamdeul bol ttaen seukinsib-eun jajehae

Ilaeseo nan ihae mos hae joh-ahaneun ma-eum issdanikka wae

Sangdaebang saeng-gag-eun an hago ili ilbangjeog-iya



Ok ok algo iss-eo algessdago

Neo na joh-ahaneun geo andago

Nado neo geumankeum joh-ahandago

Geunde nae siganman jom gajillachimyeon

Geugeol balo neon ma-eum-ui keugila jeong-uihae



Nunchi eobsneun neo uh naebdumyeon aetal tende

Gusog anin gusog-eulo nae sumtong-eul joyeo

Gyeoul-indedo deowo ilbangjeog-in neo geunyang

Ilbanjeog-ieoss-eum johgess-eo girl



Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Daehwalodo an pullineun i munjel eotteoghalkkayo

Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Ibjang bakkwo saeng-gag-eul haebondago haegyeol-i doelkkayo



Oh e oh oh e oh

Na deoneun mos chamgess-eoyo

Oh e oh oh e oh

Dabdabhae juggess-eoyo



Mollado neomu molla namjan geuleohge daluneun ge anya

Geuleolsulog deo meol-eojineun geol

Uli sai



Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Daehwalodo an pullineun i munjel eotteoghalkkayo



Ulin neomu ilbangjeog-in geol galsulog jichige doeneun geol

Ibjang bakkwo saeng-gag-eul haebondago haegyeol-i doelkkayo



Oh e oh oh e oh

Na deoneun mos chamgess-eoyo

Oh e oh oh e oh

Dabdabhae juggess-eoyo help me
